text: Kamata Jisas nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ ambami, Musi kɨvɨyɨ yaŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm vana yɨvurahɨmandɨ. Kamati ŋgɨtɨra sɨhanaŋga narɨŋandɨ indarɨmaŋgaramaŋgara vana ha mɨŋgata yɨvɨrɨmandɨ. Gotɨndu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ, Got nɨmavamba ambami, Yi sipsip karatamatama hamaŋ yɨvutatamɨtɨn sipsip haŋɨnɨŋ siŋgunziŋgu tɨvaramɨrɨmandɨyu, vamba ambami.
